title: Module 1: Introduction to Data Analytics and Power BI
topics: Overview of Data Analytics
Types of Data Analytics (Descriptive, Diagnostic, Predictive, Prescriptive)
Importance and Applications of Power BI
Power BI Components and Interface Overview
Power BI Licensing and Deployment Options
Understanding Data Connectivity and Integration

title: Module 2: Data Shaping
topics: Connecting to Different Data Sources (Excel, SQL Server, APIs, etc.)
Data Extraction Methods and Techniques
Cleaning and Transforming Data using Power Query
Data Profiling and Quality Checks
Merging and Appending Queries
Parameterizing Data Connections for Dynamic Loading
Handling Errors and Missing Data

title: Module 3: Enhancing Data Structure
topics: Managing Tables and Relationships
Creating Hierarchies and Groups
Configuring Sorting, Formatting, and Data Types
Using Lookup Tables and Bridge Tables
Data Categorization and Default Summarization
Using Role-playing Dimensions in Data Models

title: Module 4: Designing the Data Model
topics: Understanding Star and Snowflake Schemas
Defining Relationships and Cardinality
Best Practices for Normalization and Denormalization
Optimizing Data Models for Performance
Handling Many-to-Many Relationships
Working with Composite Models and DirectQuery Mode

title: Module 5: DAX (Data Analysis Expressions)
topics: Introduction to DAX
Basic Functions and Calculations (SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT, etc.)
Creating Measures and Calculated Columns
Iterative Functions (SUMX, AVERAGEX, etc.)
Time Intelligence Functions (YTD, QTD, MTD, etc.)
Contexts in DAX (Row Context, Filter Context, and Evaluation Context)
Advanced DAX Functions (Ranking, Parent-Child Hierarchies, etc.)

title: Module 6: Optimizing Model Performance
topics: Performance Tuning Best Practices
Managing Large Datasets with Aggregations
Data Compression and Partitioning Techniques
Query Reduction Techniques (Pushdown Computation, DirectQuery, etc.)
Optimizing DAX Queries for Faster Execution
Understanding Storage Modes (Import, DirectQuery, Dual)

title: Module 7: Reports and Accessibility
topics: Building Interactive Reports with Drill-through and Bookmarks
Custom Visuals and Formatting Options
Using Conditional Formatting and Dynamic Titles
Implementing Row-Level Security (RLS) in Reports
Creating Custom Tooltips and Drillthrough Pages
Accessibility Features in Power BI (Keyboard Shortcuts, Narrator, etc.)

title: Module 8: Dashboards
topics: Creating and Sharing Dashboards in Power BI Service
Pinning Reports, Visuals, and Live Data Tiles
Adding Interactive Filters and Buttons
Creating Mobile-Optimized Dashboards
Embedding Dashboards into Websites and Applications
Managing Dashboard Performance and Data Refreshes

title: Module 9: Paginated Reports
topics: Introduction to Paginated Reports and Differences from Power BI Reports
Designing Layouts and Templates for Pixel-Perfect Reports
Exporting and Printing Reports (PDF, Excel, Word, etc.)
Using Parameters in Paginated Reports
Creating Linked Reports and Drill-through Reports
Subscriptions and Automated Report Delivery

title: Module 10: Performing Advanced Analytics
topics: AI and Machine Learning Integrations (Cognitive Services, Azure ML)
Time Intelligence Calculations and Forecasting
Implementing What-If Analysis and Sensitivity Analysis
Using Statistical Functions in Power BI
Anomaly Detection and Pattern Recognition
Creating Custom AI Visuals (Key Influencers, Decomposition Tree)

title: Module 11: Managing Workspaces and Datasets
topics: Managing Power BI Workspaces and Apps
Publishing, Updating, and Refreshing Datasets
Automating Data Refresh using Power BI Gateway
Implementing Dataflows for ETL Process
Access Permissions, Role-Based Security, and Governance
Monitoring Usage and Performance with Power BI Admin Portal

title: Module 12: Project
topics: Dashboard Building Techniques (Best Practices)
Designing User-Centric Dashboards with UI/UX Considerations
Real-Time Data Integration for Dashboards (Streaming Data)
